Difficult.requirements: Specialized tools, workshop, 4–6 components (up to 2 advanced)

recipes.name: Wooden Starknife
recipes.effect: Light thrown or melee weapon. Range 10. Damage 1. On a critical failure, the starknife splinters and becomes unusable. Can be crafted or replaced quickly in the field.

recipes.name: Glass Cutter
recipes.effect: Allows precise cutting of glass, crystal, and brittle stone. Grants advantage on checks involving precision carving, engraving, or dismantling fragile objects.

recipes.name: Stone Chalk
recipes.effect: Creates durable markings resistant to moisture and wind. Useful for navigation, trap marking, ritual circles, or territorial signs.

recipes.name: Field Knife
recipes.effect: Light melee weapon. Damage 2. Functions as a general-purpose tool for cutting rope, skinning creatures, prying, or fine manual work.

recipes.name: Weighted Sling
recipes.effect: Ranged weapon. Range 20. Damage 2. Uses stones or similar ammunition. Can also launch small objects such as flasks or signal markers.

recipes.name: Reinforced Strap
recipes.effect: Strengthens attached gear or containers. Increases carrying capacity by +10 and reduces the chance of item breakage under stress.

recipes.name: Arc-Light Rod
recipes.effect: Emits steady magical light in a wide radius. Light can be focused or dimmed. When struck against a surface, releases a brief flash that may distract nearby creatures.

recipes.name: Precision Saw
recipes.effect: Cuts wood, bone, and soft metal cleanly. Grants bonuses to crafting, dismantling, and salvage tasks. Can be used as a weapon (Damage 2) in emergencies.

recipes.name: Pulley Frame
recipes.effect: Provides mechanical advantage when lifting or restraining objects. Doubles effective lifting capacity. Can be repurposed for traps, lifts, or battlefield control.

recipes.name: Fluid Regulator
recipes.effect: Controls the flow rate of liquids. Used for irrigation, timed releases, pressure balancing, or slow dispersal of substances in combat or crafting.

recipes.name: Stabilized Harness
recipes.effect: Reduces recoil, impact, and forced movement. Grants resistance to knockback and falling damage. Essential for operating heavy tools or machinery safely.

recipes.name: Arc-Driven Press
recipes.effect: Uses arcane force to compress, shape, or bind materials. Can refine components, force doors open, or deliver crushing force in combat scenarios.

recipes.name: Bone-Plated Guardian Frame
recipes.effect: A basic autonomous construct frame. Can guard an area, carry loads, or perform simple programmed tasks. Limited combat capability but highly durable.

recipes.name: Arc Suppression Array
recipes.effect: Dampens arcane activity in an area. Reduces magical effects, stabilizes volatile zones, and interferes with constructs or spellcasting devices.
